quoteText:
We may share your personal information with (a) third party service providers.
(b) business partners.
(c) affiliated companies within our corporate structure and (d) as needed for legal purposes.
title: Information is only shared with third parties if really necessary

tosdr.case: The service will not allow third parties to access your personal information without a legal basis
tosdr.tldr: They donâ€™t share your personal information with anyone except to comply with the law, develop their products, or protect their rights
